    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Onesnažene vode</string>
            <string language="en">Polluted waters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschmutztes Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les eaux polluées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Águas polluted</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acque inquinanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μολυσμένα ύδατα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aguas contaminadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Plakat o oneznaževanju voda izdelan za razstavo ob dnevu Zemlje (22. april). Avtor: Mateja Fakin, mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
            <string language="en">Poster about pollution on the water was made for an exhibition on Earth Day (April 22). Authors: Mateja Fakin, mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">onesnaževanje</string>
            <string language="en">pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dan zemlje</string>
            <string language="en">earth day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">plakat</string>
            <string language="en">poster</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plakat über Verunreinigung auf dem Wasser wurde 
für eine Ausstellung am Masse Tag (April 22) gebildet. Autoren:
Mateja Fakin, Mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'affiche au sujet de la pollution sur l'eau a 
été faite pour une exposition le jour de la terre (avril 22). 
Auteurs : Mateja Fakin, Mentorat : Violeta 
Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O poster sobre a poluição na água foi feito 
para um exhibition no dia da terra (abril 22). Autores: 
Mateja Fakin, mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il manifesto circa inquinamento sull'acqua è 
stato fatto per una mostra sul giorno della terra (il 22 aprile). 
Autori: Mateja Fakin, mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αφίσα για τη ρύπανση στο ύδωρ έγινε για μια έκθεση 
τη γήινη ημέρα (συντάκτες Απριλίου 22).: Mateja Fakin, 
σύμβουλος: violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cartel sobre la contaminación en el agua fue 
hecho para una exposición el el día de la tierra (de abril el 22). 
Autores: Mateja Fakin, mentor: Violeta Stefanovik.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
